title: Amistad National Recreation Area: Cacti / Desert Succulents
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants     Cacti / Desert Succulents                Cacti / Desert Succulents          The Cactus Family includes plants well-adapted to extreme environments. Not only do they tolerate drought and heat better than most plants, but their spiny, ungainly shapes do not suggest they produce some of nature's most beautiful and delicate flowers.
